Description: Two fragments of wool textile and yarn. The textile is of dark brow, red brown and dyed blue wool, plain weave, vertical yarns- dark brown, 1 ply S, dia. c.0.8mm tpc 8.17; horizontal yarns - dark brown, red brown and blue, 1 ply S, dia. c.7mm; tpc 11.33; it appears to have a section of blue yarns with some double picks. The other fragment is a bundle of buff yarn, 1 ply slight Z, average dia.1.21mm.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Donated by: W S Webb Museum of Anthropology (University of Kentucky)
